Modele

Class Joueur

  • java.lang.Object
    • Modele.Observable
      • Modele.Joueur
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JoueurPhys, JoueurVirt

    public class Joueur
extends Observable
    This class represents the player and is the superclass of the Virtual and Physical player. Methods are defined here and used in the subclasses.
    Author:
    dinh_, tran_
    See Also:
    Observable

    • Field Detail

      • prenom

        public java.lang.String prenom
        The designation of a player

      • estEnTour

        public boolean estEnTour
        To show if the player is taking their turn or not

      • numero

        public static int numero
        Used for GUI, to determine the number of players in a game. Each player with have their own numero that increases with the player count.

        public int getId()

      • prendreCartes

        public void prendreCartes(Carte carte,
                          Tas autreTas)
        Take a card from another Tas, then remove it from the said Tas and decrease it's card numbers accordingly, notify all observers.
        Parameters:
        carte - the card taken
        autreTas - the hand of another player

      • faireOffre

        public void faireOffre(int posCarteFaceCachee)
        This method allows a player to make an offer, choosing a card to show face down and the other, face up.
        Parameters:
        posCarteFaceCachee - the position of the card to put face up.

      • montrerOffre

        public void montrerOffre()
        This method allows the player to show their offer as a string in the console.

      • regarderMain

        public void regarderMain()
        This method allows a player to look at the cards in their hand even if it's face down.

      • prendreOffre

        public void prendreOffre(int posCarte,
                         Joueur j)
        This method allows this player to take a card from another player's offer, and put it in their jest. Notify all observers.
        Parameters:
        posCarte - the position of the card to be taken
        j - the player from whom the card is taken

      • prendreOffre

        public void prendreOffre(int pos,
                         Trophee t)
        This method allow the player to take a card from the trophy zone. Notify all observers
        Parameters:
        pos - the position of the trophy card to be taken
        t - the trophy composed of 2 cards
